column4: I installed freevo successfully but when I try to invoke it by doing ./freevo it says something..... Can anyone help me in sorting it out ?
posting the error msg in pastebin would help?
http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/10019
any idea ?
the msg says to run 'freevo setup' have you tried that?
yeah did that
let me show u... 1 sec
http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/10021
So it is fine.... but what else I can do? :(
you have to copy a file named local_conf.py.example to /home/gopi/.freevo/local_conf.py. it says it comes with freevo
yeah I did that too...... let me show what it said
http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/10023
seeing it ?
are u there ?
you have to set some variables in the file. edit it. also you need to create a directory named /var/cache/freevo. you need to install some dependencies too. i think is to much work for newbie
have you tried to look for a prepackaged version or to use mythtv?
I tried to create directory... but its not possible to create directory in /var/cache !!
yes mythtv I struggled a lot to install :(
you have to create it as root. with sudo.
Others like Zapper and TVtime viewer.... i am getting audio but no video :(
mythtv is in repositories you only have to fire up synaptic and install it
FYI, mine is an Athlon64 system but Iam using Ubuntu for AMD64
